tags.name: social-share-link
tags.description:
`social-share-link`
`a link to share content on social`

Attributes:

  * `__href` {`string`} - the href for the link

  * `__icon` {`string`} - the icon name for the link

  * `__linkText` {`string`} - the link text specified, or the default link text

  * `__showIcon` {`boolean`} - 

  * `button-style` {`boolean`} - display link as a button

  * `image` {`string`} - optional image to attach to the share
(Pinterest only)

  * `message` {`string`} - the message to attach to the social share
(not used in Facebook)

  * `mode` {`string`} - optional display mode for the link,"text-only" or "icon-only";
default is to dislay both an icon and text

  * `text` {`string`} - the link text; if null, the text will be "Share on (type of social)"

  * `type` {`string`} - the type of social; currently supports
Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and Twitter (default)

  * `url` {`string`} - the url to share

  * `type` {`string`} - the type of social; currently supports
Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and Twitter (default)

  * `url` {`string`} - the url to share
